You need to enter character name and last name.
You need to select at least three traits for your character.
Your character trait points cannot be negative. Remove some positive traits or add negative ones to balance it.

RMB - Rotate Character
Scroll - Zoom Camera
Left Shift + Scroll - Move Camera
Your character doesn't have any traits!
This trait is active. That means it will affect different aspects of gameplay.
You are a very kind person, always nice to other people. Player modifier: Increases the mood of your employees by +10 points.
This character is always nice to all encountered people. Player modifier: Increases the mood of your employees by +10 points.

You quickly get carried away by your emotions and easily fall into rage. Player modifier: Reduces the mood of your employees after a failed project / commission by -10 points. Employee modifier: Reduces the mood of the character after reduction of their salary by additional -10 points.

This character quickly gets carried away by emotions and falls into rage. Player modifier: Reduces the mood of your employees after a failed project / commission by -10 points. Employee modifier: Reduces the mood of the character after reduction of their salary by additional -10 points.
You are very good at gaining new knowledge and skills. Player modifier: Increases gained experience by +10%. Employee modifier: Increases gained experience by +10%.
This character is great at gaining new knowledge and skills. Player modifier: Increases gained experience by +10%. Employee modifier: Increases gained experience by +10%.

You love working and it brings you a lot of joy and satisfaction. Player modifier: Increases the speed of working on components by +10%. Employee modifier: Increases the speed of working on components by +10%.

This character loves to work and it brings them a lot of joy and satisfaction. Player modifier: Increases the speed of working on components by +10%. Employee modifier: Increases the speed of working on components by +10%.

You can squeeze out the last penny from every person you meet. Player modifier: Reduces the maximum pay rise available for an employee to +15%. Employee modifier: Increases the employee's salary by +25%. Decreases the employee’s mood after reducing salary by -10 points. Increases the employee’s mood after pay rise by +10 points.

This character can squeeze out the last penny from every single person. Player modifier: Reduces the maximum pay rise available for an employee to +15%. Employee modifier: Increases the employee's salary by +25%. Decreases the employee’s mood after reducing salary by -10 points. Increases the employee’s mood after pay rise by +10 points.

You are a terribly jealous person who feels bad not having something that others have. Employee modifier: If the employee's salary is not the highest in the company, they will receive a mood penalty of -10 points.
This character is terribly jealous of things that others have. Employee modifier: If the employee's salary is not the highest in the company, they will receive a mood penalty of -10 points.

You are excellent at communicating what you have on your mind, but also at listening to what others have to say. Player modifier: Increases the speed of working on components by +2% for each additionally hired employee. Employee modifier: Increases the speed of working on components by +2% for each additionally hired employee.

This character is excellent at communicating what they mean, but also listening to what others have to say. Player modifier: Increases the speed of working on components by +2% for each additionally hired employee. Employee modifier: Increases the speed of working on components by +2% for each additionally hired employee.

You love being around other people and feel great in their company. Player modifier: Increases the mood of the character for each additional employee by +3 points. Employee modifier: Increases the mood of the character for each additional employee by +3 points.

This character loves being around other people and feels great in their company. Player modifier: Increases the mood of the character for each additional employee by +3 points. Employee modifier: Increases the mood of the character for each additional employee by +3 points.

The years are passing and your body is getting weaker and sicker. Player modifier: Reduces the speed of working on components by -50%. Employee modifier: Reduces the speed of working on components by -50%.

The years are passing and this character is getting weaker and sicker. Player modifier: Reduces the speed of working on components by -50%. Employee modifier: Reduces the speed of working on components by -50%.

You never mince your words and always say exactly what you think. Especially when it is something not nice. Player modifier: Reduces the mood of your employees by -15 points. Employee modifier: Reduces the mood of every other employee by -5 points.

This character never minces their words and always says whatever they mean. Especially when it is something not nice. Player modifier: Reduces the mood of your employees by -15 points. Employee modifier: Reduces the mood of every other employee by -5 points.
You love to order people around and tell them what to do, no matter what they say. Player modifier: Your employees work +10% faster, but get a penalty of -10 points to their mood.
This character loves to order people around and tell them what to do, no matter what they say. Player modifier: Your employees work +10% faster, but get a penalty of -10 points to their mood.

Physical strength is not your strength. Your body is weak and fragile. Player modifier: Reduces the maximum energy of the character to 75 points. Employee modifier: Reduces the maximum energy of the character to 75 points.

Physical strength is not a strength of this character. Their body is weak and fragile. Player modifier: Reduces the maximum energy of the character to 75 points. Employee modifier: Reduces the maximum energy of the character to 75 points.

You are constantly full of energy and cannot sit still in one place for a brief moment. Player modifier: Increases the maximum employee energy to 125 points. Employee modifier: Increases the maximum employee energy to 125 points.

This character is constantly full of energy and cannot sit still in one place for a brief moment. Player modifier: Increases the maximum employee energy to 125 points. Employee modifier: Increases the maximum employee energy to 125 points.
Your head is always full of fresh and original ideas. Player modifier: Increases the speed of working on components by +10%. Employee modifier: Increases the speed of working on components by +10%.

Head of this character is always full of fresh and original ideas. Player modifier: Increases the speed of working on components by +10%. Employee modifier: Increases the speed of working on components by +10%.

Making up new and original ideas comes with great difficulty for this character. Player modifier: Reduces the speed of working on components by -10%. Employee modifier: Reduces the speed of working on components by -10%.

You are an introverted person who feels best in solitude, away from other people. Player modifier: Decreases the mood of the character for every additional employee by -5 points. Employee modifier: Decreases the mood of the character for every additional employee by -5 points.

This character is an introverted person who feels best alone, away from other people. Player modifier: Decreases the mood of the character for every additional employee by -5 points. Employee modifier: Decreases the mood of the character for every additional employee by -5 points.

New Furniture Unlocked! Following furnitures have been unlocked:
You can check them out in the Build Mode.

This revolutionary darkwood desk was made by our skilled workers. Everything is done with great care and thought. Our little hands have worked out the smallest details in this desk, hoping for the best possible comfort of customers. Everything has been made from recycled noble wood, so there is no chance of any breakage or rapid worn-out.

And here it is! A refreshed version of our iconic furniture. This desk is able to accommodate two monitors at the same time and not collapse! This is a great success of our company and therefore the price has been raised accordingly. Used metal inserts have been colored with pastel crayons so that they do not stand out from dark wood. The design of this desk has been assessed by numerous foreign buyers as almost good!

A solid desk made from scratch especially for this kind of monitors, really! It's not at all that this is the previous model that is sold for the second time under a different name. We're sure you'll like our desk, and if not, it's your problem. We don't accept returns.

It is a model for picky people, but definitely worthy of recommendation. It has its flaws and imperfections, however, the top was made of a solid, wooden board, which will certainly not fall apart soon... Although we do not guarantee that.

This is by far the most advanced desk in our offer. I don't know how, but it is capable of accommodating two huge 16:9 monitors! It was probably enchanted by our company's great magician. Please handle it respectfully.

This tall shelf made of the darkwood is a great purchase for long winter nights! You can keep things on it, from books to your collection of ropes. And when it gets to its end, it's working perfectly as firewood for your fireplace!

Have you ever wanted to have a tall, white shelf to store your books and toys? Now is your chance to get one! We present you with our latest shelfs collection. It's all white, like milk! You like milk, right? We reassure you that no cow suffered during the production of this fantastic piece of furniture.

The high, big shelf made of the darkwood is a great purchase for long winter nights! You can keep things on it, from books to a cage with annoying neighbor’s dog. And when it gets to its end, it's working perfectly as firewood for your fireplace!

I'm sure you once thought to yourself, "Hmm… It would be really cool to have a white, big and high shelf..." Now is your chance to get one! We present you with our latest shelfs collection. It's all white, like milk! You like milk, right? We reassure you that no cow suffered during the production of this fantastic piece of furniture.

This dark wood wardrobe will provide space for all of your clothes, including leather, glans and chains for concerts. And if you don't like metal, you can always put your pets' clothes there, or your neighbours' pets' clothes...

This is the smallest shelf in our white collection. But don't let its size fool you. It's so spacious that it can even fit your entire Steam Library in there! It's all white, like milk! You like milk, right? We reassure you that no cow suffered during the production of this fantastic piece of furniture.
It's just a red rose... The same one you'd like to give to your beloved ones hoping to spend the rest of your life with them... Unfortunately, you are a programmer...
A white lily, supposedly a sign of tidiness... Is that why you buy it? You better start cleaning up! Plants won’t help you with keeping off the dust!
Lavender that has a very nice smell. When there's enough of it, it can cover up bad smells, like your whole week scent for example. But it also looks nice in the room.
Sunflower is a plant that always turns towards the sun. However, thanks to our revolutionary technology of non-genetic engineering, we have managed to modify it so that it always stay the same way!

This compact misty shower provides water without any worries. It ensures the right level of cleanliness and an overwhelming amount of water. There is enough of it for at least three people! The rustproof frame makes the cabin resistant to aging. The Misty Shower is ideal for any kind of creature, even unicorns!

Built on ancient engineering principles such as gravity and fluid dynamics, the HBB toilet has become the basis of modern hygiene and efficiency. Wastewater is drained away quickly and the siphon stops almost all unpleasant odors before they return to the room. The ingeniously opening toilet seat and the flush handle make using the toilet easier than ever before. Hunt down your own HBB now!
Simple bathroom sink with hot AND cold water control, handy soap dish, and wide basin. It is designed to serve as a place to wash your hands, so please do not use it as a bathtub.

This simple white fridge allows you to store food with both short and long shelf-life, extending it by a few hours, days, weeks, years and so on. The patented gas technology produces only a minimal amount of carbon monoxide. The product comes with shelves, drawers, doors and a small dwarf that if not fed, will be disobedient, which can lead to numerous complications.

Tired of cold food and summer decoration? Nothing warms the kitchen like a white oven! The exciting dual-fuel design allows this wonder to be used with both the explosive power of natural gas and innovative electric currents. You can use it to heat up your pre-cooked meals or prepare your own!

Are you tired of getting your hands dirty and washing plates after yourself? Now you have the solution! Buy the latest NRE dishwasher to save yourself the trouble. The innovative triple-drying technology invented by our creative team of housewives is perfect for everyday life. Just pack it in, put the cube in, and fire! With this device you will start a completely new relationship with your dishwashing!
A kitchen worktop with two lockers will provide space for all your pots, pans or bowls, and after dark, it makes a brilliant place to hide in the hide-and-seek game.
The kitchen worktop with three drawers is ideal for all cutlery, knives, lighters, needles, threads, tasers, machine guns, or candles for the cake. "Who knows what can be useful in the kitchen?"
A simple piece of kitchen worktop together with its casing, made of solid plywood will serve you for many years! Unless you jump on it. Don't jump on your worktop.
White Worktop with Two Lockers and Sink
You can't miss it in the kitchen, a perfect place to relax, throw away all your negative emotions, invent winning situations, challenge social constructs and wash plates.
Darkwood Kitchen Table with Four Chairs

A darkwood kitchen table with four chairs is ideal for any home! Seemingly small but big, narrow but wide. Scientists to this day cannot understand how it can accommodate a 12-person party. It still remains a secret of our company.
Lightwood Kitchen Table with Four Chairs

A lightwood wood kitchen table with four chairs is ideal for any home! Seemingly small but big, narrow but wide. Scientists to this day cannot understand how it can accommodate a 12-person party. It still remains a secret of our company.
A magnificent, beautiful, majestic, red just like the blood of all OUR enemies carpet, worth all the money.
A darkwood commode that fits perfectly in your living room. Spacious, wide, perfect for the big TV you plan to buy in the near future, right? I mean, you must finally start watching TVPeace!
A lightwood commode is a perfect match for the living room.  Spacious, wide, perfect for the big TV you plan to buy in the near future, right? I mean, you must finally start watching TVPeace!

A darkwood commode with an old TV will keep you entertained for years to come! Black and white TV, spanish soap operas, loud buzzing speakers, and no remote control, just like in the good, old times. In addition, we throw in a few books in Javanese and free, unlimited access to TVPeace.

A lightwood commode with an old TV will keep you entertained for years to come! Black and white TV, spanish soap operas, loud buzzing speakers, and no remote control, just like in the good, old time. In addition, we throw in a few books in Javanese and free, unlimited access to TVPeace.
The red modern carpet is a perfect idea to buy either for your living room or bedroom. It keeps the dust out and looks great on the floor. It's easy to use, just lay it down and you can wallow.
The grey modern carpet is a perfect idea to buy either for your living room or bedroom. It keeps the dust out and looks great on the floor. It's easy to use, just lay it down and you can wallow.

This is a chair. A darkwood chair. You can use it to sit on it or to tie someone up. But remember to always have a safeword. And today's safeword is… BSOD! Because you are a programmer… And you will never use it…

This is a chair. A lightwood chair. You can use it to sit on it or to tie someone up. But remember to always have a safeword. And today's safeword is… BSOD! Because you are a programmer… And you will never use it…

This is the pumpkin that has been harassing you for ages... Today it came back! Raised from the remaining little pumpkin from the previous year, it is even stronger and scarier than all the other pumpkins of our competition put together! Order your own today!

Do you remember your childhood years and your grandmother's words that the oblong pumpkins are not suitable for Halloween? She was definitely not right! Everything can be a pumpkin for Halloween if you are brave enough!
Poor little pumpkin. Probably had a dream to become a big, powerful pumpkin, but we, wretched people, treat them as decorations. But what I was... Oh yes - buy it now at this exceptional price!

Do you believe in ghosts? No?! With this low Halloween lamp, you certainly will! Especially during an alcoholic Halloween party, after a few deeper drinks. With the right background sounds effect guaranteed!

Do you believe in ghosts? No?! With this tall Halloween lamp, you certainly will! Especially during an alcoholic Halloween party, after a few deeper drinks. With the right background sounds effect guaranteed!

Need a quick course in human anatomy? Order this ultra-realistic, human skeleton right now. Nobody knows what it is really made of. It could be plastic, or maybe c-c-calcium... or even real b-b-bones...? Hopefully not, but who knows, maybe someone wanted to save on material.
Last year's skeleton model did not sell so well... Therefore, out of concern for the environment, we decided to bury it and use it from the grave! I mean in the grave...
Simple structure of a website divided into header, main page content and footer.
Allows you to upload and display multiple images on your website at once.
The structure of a website that is based on tiles of different size and arrangement on the screen.
Ensures that the website is correctly displayed on screens of different formats and resolutions.
Allows you to add animated elements of the website in the form of GIFs.
Your website uses a palette of matching colors.
Website design composed of rounded shapes with a large number of different effects.
Website design composed of simple shapes and colours without using effects such as shadows or gradients.
Website design based on simplicity and clarity of its structure and appearance.
Website design based on a vivid, selected colour palette, relative simplicity and the use of light, accentuating effects such as shadows.
Allows you to add fluid animations to your website.
Allows you to connect a relational database to a website to store data in it.
Allows you to create simple web scripts, run on the browser end, adding simple functionality to the site.
Allows visitors to create an account on your website.
An online forum that allows users to discuss various topics divided into relevant sections.
Online chat allows users to write messages to each other in a real time.
Allows visitors to create their own blog where they can share things important to them with the world.
Allows you to add videos to your website.
Allows you to add comments visible to all visitors of the website.
A website that allows you to exchange content and communicate with people from all over the world.
Allows you to host a live broadcast on your website.
Manual testing, which is very time-consuming and requires non-standard thinking to find all possible errors.
Simple, unencrypted Internet protocols that allow data exchange over the network.
Secure Internet protocols that guarantee security and resistance to interception of data transmitted over the network.
Collecting logs allows you to track activity on your website in order to detect errors and irregularities in its operation.
Secure passwords are the most important defence against hackers. It allows you to add the required password strength to your website.
Allows you to implement additional security measures on websites to increase their security.
Automated testing saves a lot of time for testing newly added functions.
Simple user interface adapted to operate on small phone screens.
Allows you to correctly switch and display your mobile application when the device is held horizontally.
Dark theme of the application saves many people's eyes and makes their lives better!
User interface, which focuses on the greatest possible intuitiveness of its functionality.
User interface, which focuses on ensuring that new users don't have problems with using your application.
Allows users to purchase virtual goods for a small amount of money directly in the application.
Allows you to create a premium version of the application, containing new features, for which users will have to pay an additional fee.
Allows you to place ads in your applications to earn money on your projects over time.
Allows you to send notifications to users from applications that appear on the phone bar.
Allows you to handle simple gestures in your application, such as double tapping or pressing down on the element on the screen.
Allows you to control the strength of the pressure on phone screen and to program new functions based on read value.
Allows you to determine the location of your device on a world map.
Allows you to handle more advanced gestures in your application, such as moving items without touching the screen with your hand movement.
Allows your application to recognize user's voice to execute a voice command or to convert speech to text.
Allows your applications to be displayed above others.
Allows you to use your phone for Virtual Reality technology.
Allows synchronization of data and application notifications with a computer.
Allows you to use your phone for Enhanced Reality technology.
Allows you to synchronize application data with the cloud.
Manual testing, which is very time-consuming and requires non-standard thinking to find all possible errors.
Allows you to secure your application with a PIN code.
Automated testing saves a lot of time for testing newly added functions.
Allows you to secure your application with a pattern drawn on the screen.
Allows you to secure your application with a fingerprint scan.
Allows you to optimize the application to use as little mobile data as possible during transmission.
Allows you to secure your application with Biometrics.
A simple story that tells you exactly what happens from one point in time to the next without any branching or time leaps.
Simple level structure with one possible solution to the problem.
The art style of a game that aims for interesting, stylized looks rather than realism.
More advanced level structure with more than one possible solution to the problem.
Levels that are not limited by any constraints where players can go anywhere and whenever they want.
Design that focuses on making the most money out of your game by adding in-game purchases and microtransactions.
System of main and side missions that are connected to each other. From now on, the NPCs will be able to get hit by an arrow in the knee.
Your game will put the player in front of many morally ambiguous choices that will affect the fate of the characters and the story.
Your game will not only tell stories created by you, but also the ones that emerge from the player’s interactions with various game systems, that were not planned by you.
Your game will have many distinct story branches that will lead to number of different choices and endings.
The art style of a game that aims for the best possible representation of reality.
You will be able to render 2D images in your games.
Simple artificial intelligence that will allow players for basic interactions with NPCs in your games.
Allows you to simulate basic physical interactions between objects in your game.
You will be able to render 3D images in your games.
Basic algorithms that allow you to cast your game scene on to the screen with finite resolution more easily.
Advanced artificial intelligence that will allow players for more different interactions and more unpredictable behaviors of NPCs.
Basic shaders that determine how light and shadows interact with game models.
Advanced shaders allow you to achieve more realistic effects of light and shadows on your models such as reflections or diffractions.
Allows you to simulate advanced physical interactions between multiple objects in your game without a big performance impact.
An optimized version of algorithms that allow you to cast your game scene on to the screen with finite resolution.
Provides realistic lighting, shadows, and reflections by simulating the physical behavior of light in real-time without big performance impact.
Manual balance takes a lot of time and requires lots of playtests to find the perfect balance between game mechanics.
Basic systems that try to prevent players from cheating in your game.
Manual testing, which is very time-consuming and requires non-standard thinking to find all possible errors.
Allows your players to play with each other at the same time in one game instance.
Mystic Banhammer, forged from hellish steel and divine providence. Allows you to permanently block someone from playing your game.
Hidden, advanced mechanisms that try to prevent players from cheating in your game.
Simple mechanisms, like required internet connection, that try to prevent getting your game from illegal sources.
Allows you to find more bugs earlier through gathering additional information in logs and tracking solved problems.
More advanced mechanisms that try to prevent hackers from cracking your game and sharing it online.
Automated testing saves a lot of time for testing newly added functions and game mechanics.
An automatic balance system allows you to test all variables in your game to find the most relevant values.

Thank you so much for buying our game! We hope you'll have a lot of fun playing it! Here is a quick tutorial on how to play. Chapters: {0} Use arrows below to move between tutorial stages or close it by clicking "X". You can come back here any time by clicking "?" in the top left corner. To return to this chapter click on DevLife Tutorial.

Welcome to DevLife! Here are some basic camera controls: - Hold RMB - Rotate Camera - Scroll - Zoom Camera - WSAD - Move Camera - Left Shift - Speed-up Camera You can also use arrows on your keyboard: - Arrow Up / Down - Zoom Camera - Arrow Left / Right - Rotate Camera Horizontally - Left Alt + Arrow Up / Down - Rotate Camera Vertically Press F6 to toggle cinematic camera: - E / Q - Move Camera Up / Down - Left Shift - Slow Down Camera - F7 - Take Screenshot
The very first step you should take is assigning you character to the workstation. Click on the Workstation Tracker and then select your employee.
Thanks to Workstation Trackers you can manage your employees, create new projects and learn new skills. Remember that employee must be assign to workstation to be able to create projects.

Although you've already selected three skills for your character you cannot use them to create projects. First you must learn how to use them. You have two options to do that: - Buy one of the courses available in the Workstation Tracker -> Learning - Create learning project in the Workstation Tracker -> New Project -> Learning Then choose skill you want to learn. You need to learn at least one skill by buying a course and complete at least one learning project to proceed.

In DevLife you have many options to customize and upgrade your working space. To do that you need to enter the Build Mode by clicking on it's icon in the bottom panel. Location furnishings and its appearance directly affects the mood of your employees and the effectiveness of their work. It's worth making sure that your workspace looks as good as possible! To place a furniture just Drag and Drop it into the available space. Many furnitures have variants which you can choose by clicking RMB on the furniture button to pin the furniture information. If you want to sell furniture press X on your keyboard while dragging it. Use Q and E to rotate the furniture.

In order to create and publish your own projects you will need to create a company. In addition for them to be effective, you'll need to have a large fan base that is willing to buy your product. At the beginning, commissions for external clients will have to be enough for you. To unlock commissions searches you must learn at least one skill by buying a course and complete at least one learning project. First of all you need to search the market for appropriate commissions. Open the Commissions Search window, select commissions search criteria, start the search and then select employee to perform the search. Tip: At the beginning of the game it's advisable to select the "Only Unlocked" option. To be able to select more criteria you will need to upgrade your company. Also remember that some search criteria may be incompatible with each other and therefore prevent you from finding the right commissions.

After you perform successful commissions search you will get a message with the results. You can also find them in the Commissions Manager.

Click on the found commission to see the details about it and decide whether or not it's worth taking.

You can also reject the offer if you are not intereseted. Remember that your clients won't wait forever and after some time their offers will expire.

It is good idea to select only one commision on the beginning of your adventure.

When you accept commission you need to create new project. To do that click Create Project Button in the Commission Panel or Workstation Tracker -> New Project -> Commercial. In the Project Creator window you need to select all components that are required in the commission. You can also add more components, create your own project (to do that deselect commission) or a learning one.

To start working on a component you need to click on it and assign one of your employees to start creating it. There are many variables that affect the speed of programming. The most important ones are: - Employee Stats - Employee Mood - Component Level - Component Advancement There is a chance of your employee thinking about solution to a problem in his component. This chance decreases with the component level. There is one more thing that you need to be aware of - Employee Energy. Each action performed by employee requires energy. It regenerates with time, but if you overwork your employee he will need to go to a vacation. You can add Employee Energy by clicking Wokrstation Tracker -> Employee -> Add Energy

There is one very important thing that you need to be aware of - Employee Energy. Each action performed by employee requires energy. It regenerates with time, but if you overwork your employee he will need to go to a vacation. You can add Employee Energy by clicking Wokrstation Tracker -> Employee -> Add Energy Option for sending employee for a vacation is in the same tab.

At any point during working on a project you can decide to end it. However, remember that if it's not finished it will have it's repercussions.

If your project is from a commission then you need to finish it before the deadline pass. If you don't make it in time you will get a penalty from commissioner.

Report after each project is available in the Messages window.

After your employee gains enough experience he will advanced to the next level. Each level gives you one skill point which you can use to unlock new skills or upgrade the old ones. To spend your skill points click on the corresponding notification or use Workstation Tracker -> Employee -> Skills If you decide to upgrade your skill it will instantly advance on the next level. Remeber that newly bought skill won't be available in projects until you upgrade / learn them on at least 1 level. They also won't increase your employee stats.

The most important goal of the game is to create and manage your own company. To do that you must first finish at least one commission successfully and then meet the required conditions listed in the Create Company panel. Creating company is crucial to unlocking new options and progressing in the game. Thanks to it you will be able to hire more employees and unlock many bonuses that will improve your work. More on that in the Company Upgrades tutorial stage.

To help you with upgrading your company from time to time you will recive goals for your company. You can access the list of Company Goals by hovering over it's icon or by clicking on it to keep it visible all the time. You will get additional money and company Upgrade Points for fulfilling this goals.

In the finance panel you will find all information about your money. After creating your company you will be able to transfer money between your accounts and take bigger loans. To unlock better loans you will first have to unlock corresponding upgrades in the Company Upgrades. More on that in the next tutorial stage.

To access Company Upgrades you can click on the corresponding notification or open your Company Manager -> Company Upgrades. You can select from many upgrades from different categories. Almost every upgrade has it's levels which increase given bonus. To unlock / upgrade one of the upgrades you need to have Company Upgrade Points. You can earn them by finishing Company Goals or leveling your company.

Creating company allows you to hire more employees. The whole process of searching for employees is very similar to searching commissions. Choose search criteria, assign employee to perform the search and at the end see the message with the results. Every location has the maximum number of employees which you can have at the time. In first location you can hire only one additional employee. If you want to hire more, you'll have to buy new location. More on that in the next tutorial stage. If you decide that you don't need your employees anymore you can fire them in the Employees Manager. There you will also find more information about the employees you hire. Tip: Remember that some search criteria may be incompatible with each other and therefore prevent you from finding the right candidate.

In current version of the game there are two locations: Family House - your current location and City Center Office. You can travel between location by clicking on the floating arrow at the edge of each map. Every location has it's bonuses but also costs and bills. To see them you need to zoom out the camera to show Location Trackers. There you can find all information about the location and buy it. In the future there will be planty of new locations available for you to explore! That's the end of tutorial! You can come back here any time by clicking "?" in the top left corner.
Are you sure you want to cancel Interactive Tutorial?

Welcome to DevLife! Thank you so much for buying our game! We hope you'll have fun playing it! In order to make it easier for you to get started, we've prepared this short, Interactive Tutorial, in which you'll learn the basic of game mechanics. To start the Interactive Tutorial, click on the "Let's get going!" button. You know how to play? If so, you can skip the tutorial and go directly into the game. In case of any problems, you can use the text tutorial available after clicking on the "?" icon in the upper left corner of your screen.

Learning Even though your character already has three skills that you chose during the character creation, they cannot be used in projects. To change this, you must first learn them. There are three ways to do that in the game: - Buying courses - Creating learning projects - Upgrading with Skill Points In this tutorial we will show you the first two options. Follow the arrows visible on your screen to proceed.

Time Control Once you have started learning a skill, you need to wait a certain amount of time until your character has completed the selected course. To speed up this process, use the keys from 1 to 4, or click on the arrows at the top of the screen. To pause the game press Space or the Pause button, which is also located at the top of your screen.

Creating Projects The second way to learn new skills is creating learning projects. In addition to them, it is also possible to create projects from commissions, and in the future, after the establishment of your company, also completely own projects! Follow the arrows to open the Project Creator and proceed.
Creating Projects To assign a component to the project, click on it with LMB or drag it to the Selected Components panel. Create your first learning project to proceed.

Assigning Employees to Components Once the project is created, it will appear on the right side of the screen. To start working on its components, you need to assign employees to them. To do this, click on the selected component and then select an employee from the list. Follow the arrows visible on your screen to proceed.

Ending Work on Project At any time after creating a project, you can finish working on it by clicking on the "Release" button. Remember, however, that in the case of commissions and your own commercial projects, the completion rate of the project will affect its outcome. Complete the learning project to proceed.
First Commission You have gained some experience and you know how to create basic components. It's time to search for your first commission. Open the Commissions Search window to proceed.

Commissions Search In DevLife there are many search criteria for commissions. The most important one of them is "Only Unlocked", which will only provide you with commissions that you can complete at the given time. To proceed, start a new commission search with the "Only Unlocked" option checked.

Assigning Employee to Search Just like with working on components, you need to assign one of your employees to continue the search. Click on the commissions search and then select an employee from the list to proceed.

Employee Energy Note that every action your character performs takes the energy. After finishing this tutorial, you will be able to increase its amount in the Workstation Tracker -> Employee -> Add Energy Control the level of energy visible as a green bar above the workstation and let your employees rest from time to time. If the employee's energy is at a low value for a long time, they will become overworked. You can solve that problem by sending them on vacation. This option is also available in the Employee tab. Complete the current commissions search to proceed.

Interactive Tutorial Completed! You have completed your first commissions search and therefore this Interactive Tutorial. You already know the basics of playing DevLife and thanks to that your career in the IT industry can proceed! Your next goal is to accept and fulfill your first commission. You will find the search results in your messages or in the Commissions Manager window. In case of any problems, you can always use the text tutorial available by clicking on the "?" icon just above the messages button. Good luck!

For some time you've felt in yourself that your end is near... Your body has been getting weaker and weaker, but you have always had the serenity and willingness to work. But this moment had to come, you have died. Your adventure in the IT world is over. We hope that by looking back in the past you are satisfied with how your developer's life went.

Thank you so much for playing DevLife and surviving to the end. If you see this message we are really surprised that you had enough constipation to reach this point, especially with the current state of the game :P In the current version, your character's death occurs in a predetermined, older age and does not affect your gameplay. You can easily continue with the game, but we do not guarantee that it will be stable. In the future, however, it will be up to you to decide when your adventure ends, making decisions in various events. We hope that you will look forward to it.

Thank you again for playing! :)
Roman Studio

Best wishes for your 18th birthday! You're just entering the next, independent way of life. Your birthday party was loud and very successful. You had a great time with your friends and family. It was definitely an unforgettable night! You also received quite a lot of gifts that will allow you to enter adulthood with a little more capital. But to keep things real, your parents will stop sending you money to cover your bills. From now on, you'll have to pay for your own living. On the other hand, you will finally be able to fulfill your dream and start your company! The world is now open to you. Don't waste it!

Halloween Event! Welcome to the DevLife Halloween Event! It will take place from the 29th of October to the 5th of November. We've prepared a few things for this occasion: - New decorations for Halloween in Build Mode - Spooky soundtrack by GWriterStudio - Special, scary camera filter - No lights in locations during nights - Halloween decorations in the environment - New Steam achievements We hope that you will enjoy it :D Please share your Halloween screenshot with the community on Steam or our Discord server. You can access the Cinematic Camera by pressing F6. Use F7 to take a screenshot. They are stored in Documents/DevLife/Screenshots ;)

Welcom to Pre-Release version of DevLife! If you are reading this message, you are among the incredible lucky individuals who have the chance to be chased to hard and slave work to test this game. Of course you won't get anything for it what do you think! In the top left corner of your screen is a quick tutorial on how to play this game and what features are available in this version. If you found any bug go to mesotegames.com/bugsreport and send us screenshots, videos or list of steps to recreate the problem ;) To work, slave! Jakub 'Theromanek100' Kiryluk
